message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
You were too generous last round, I'll take a bit more this time!
Not bad, but I'm still not getting a good deal!
You're getting greedy, Bob! Let's meet in the middle this time!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more for my negotiating skills!
You're trying to get a better deal by claiming you deserve more for negotiating skills? I don't think so!
You want to negotiate? Fine, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm not getting any younger, I want my share now!
You think you're getting older, Bob? I'm the one who's being taken advantage of here!
Fine, let's split it 50/50. But I'm not getting any more generous than this!
